content:
The provided chunk represents the initial setup section of a Python module focused on implementing curve editing functionality using Panda3D. This includes essential imports for handling 3D operations (BitMask32, Mat4, NodePath), object interaction via DirectSelection (SelectionRay), rope manipulation (Rope), and task management in the application (Task). These imports are foundational for enabling the creation and modification of curves within a 3D environment.

"""
This is the module for curve edit
"""

from panda3d.core import BitMask32, Mat4, NodePath
from direct.showbase.DirectObject import DirectObject
from direct.directtools.DirectSelection import SelectionRay
from direct.showutil.Rope import Rope
from direct.task import Task
